derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: from obsolete French umbellifêre, from Latin umbella 'parasol' + -fer 'bearing'

means.word_mean: 1. any of numerous aromatic herbs of the family Umbelliferae

auth_sentence.content: It is in the Umbellifer family, as is a fatally toxic plant called poison hemlock.
